objects.specification: A large rectangular floor panel in a neutral tone, designed as the base of the exhibition booth with a flat, smooth surface and minimalistic texture to ensure focus remains on showcased items.
Solid rectangular booth wall in a neutral tone, featuring a smooth finish and uniform coloration, forming a sturdy perimeter for the exhibition space.

A realistic, full-scale demonstration car model with a glossy red exterior and modern aerodynamic styling, featuring detailed body panels, authentic wheel rims, and a subtle interior visible through transparent windows.

A sleek, professional registration desk with a smooth neutral-toned front panel and wooden or metallic accents, including a flat countertop surface and integrated storage compartments underneath for brochures and equipment.

A bright-colored display stand crafted for showcasing brochures or accessories, consisting of a slender vertical panel with a sturdy base, finished with a glossy vibrant color to draw attention to displayed materials.
